programme.title: President Reagan's social programmes
programme.short_synopsis: The diverse support for Ronald Reagan and a rise in welfare spending.
programme.medium_synopsis: A switch from Democrat to Republican in the southern states, the gender gap in the support of President Reagan, and the rise in government spending on social programs.
